alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 01 at 1:20PM PDT until May 01 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 50 to locally 60 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. Strongest wind gusts below passes and on the desert slopes. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Driving high-profile vehicles could be hazardous in the windiest areas and visibility could be restricted in blowing dust. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will slowly decrease overnight and then increase again tomorrow afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
